answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found sample RFPs that might be a good start for your search. 
RFP for Garbage & Recycling Services from Town of Cheraw, SC
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/14921/RFP_Garbage_Recycling_Services
Solid Waste Collection and Disposal RFP from Parker, TX
http://www.ci.parker.tx.us/posting/bid%20notices/v10.1%20solidwaste%20bid%20document%20v10.1.pdf
Washtenaw County, MI RFP for Solid Waste Disposal and Recycling Services. 
http://www.ewashtenaw.org/government/departments/finance/purchasing/online_bids/assets_2010/rfp6518.pdf
Solid Waste Collection RFP from Lake Forest Park, WA
http://www.mrsc.org/rfps/l35solidwaste.pdf
RFP for Solid Waste Collection and Transportation with Recycling and Yard Waste from Belmont, MA
http://www.town.belmont.ma.us/Public_Documents/BelmontMA_proposalrequests/Solid%20Waste,%20Recycling%20&%20Yard%20Waste%20RFP
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org


Hello,

I found sample RFPs that might be a good start for your search. 

RFP for Garbage & Recycling Services from Town of Cheraw, SC

author: Emily Moon
text: Our town will soon close its landfill and needs to make some decisions about how solid waste will be collected and disposed.  I'm looking for example RFPs for those services. Thank you.
title: Example RFPs for Solid Waste Collection
